recommendations: Ivan Maltsev ‚ÄúIt's my pleasure to recommend my partner Taras, who brings a powerful blend of VC investment expertise and hands-on entrepreneurial experience. As a VC, Taras demonstrates an exceptional ability to identify high-potential companies and guide them strategically through all stages of growth. He asks incisive questions, analyzes complex models, and structures investments creatively. Prior to VC, Taras founded and led a successful company and did an exit. He knows firsthand the challenges founders face and empathy informs his investing approach. Taras enjoys mentoring entrepreneurs through obstacles he encountered. Taras also excels at negotiating, structuring deals, and achieving win-win outcomes. He balances conviction with compassion, and has founders' best interests at heart. With both VC tenure and an entrepreneurial track record, Taras evaluates companies with unique multidimensional perspective. He sees risks, motivations and pathways others may miss. Please feel free to reach out if you would like to learn more about Taras. I am confident his experience founding, exiting and now backing companies makes him an ideal ally for any emerging venture.‚Äù

Jose Maria Seminara ‚ÄúI am delighted to write this LinkedIn recommendation for Taras. During my time at the 3X capital fund program, I had the privilege of witnessing their exceptional skills, dedication, and commitment to our shared professional goals. First, he has profound understanding of their field and a wealth of practical experience. They have a remarkable ability to distill complex concepts into understandable terms, making it easier for mentees to grasp and apply the knowledge. Second, Taras is diligent in setting clear goals and objectives for the mentorship relationship. They help mentees establish a roadmap for their personal and professional development and work tirelessly to help them achieve their goals. Third, Taras is adept at tailoring their mentorship style to suit the needs and preferences of each mentee. This adaptability ensures that the mentorship is a personalized and meaningful experience for the mentees. If you‚Äôre looking for a colleague, collaborator, manager, or leader on your venture team, I can‚Äôt think of anyone I‚Äôd recommend more highly.‚Äù
